articles.author: Cassidy Wixom, KSL.com
articles.title: BYU, Toyota develop new welding technique for minivan sliding doors - KSL.com
articles.description: The future of minivans is being developed by an unlikely partnership: BYU engineers and Toyota.
articles.content:
PROVO An unlikely partnership is developing the future of minivans: engineers at Brigham Young University and the Japanese vehicle-manufacturing giant Toyota.
